author: rjollos
msg: Moved `#content` to the outermost div on the template. Refs #217, #271.
This puts `bh_ticket.html` in line with other templates in Trac and Bloodhound, and results in the ticket comment textarea having monospace font.

author: breser
msg: Fix info message from http core about missing filename.  Followup to r1512432.
